entry.title: A dataset on scientific articles dealing with plant cover in rubber (Hevea Brasiliensis) cropping systems (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)
entry.content:
A dataset on scientific articles dealing with plant cover in rubber (Hevea Brasiliensis) cropping systems

Moisan, Léa, 2021, "A dataset on scientific articles dealing with plant cover in rubber (Hevea Brasiliensis) cropping systems", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/IOELH1, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
This dataset present the compilation of 72 scientific articles dealing with the use of covers in rubber tree plantations. These articles were selected following a review of litterature performed with the Web of Science, CAB abstract, Google Scholar, and some personnal communicati...

This dataset is joint with the scientific publication named "A Multiple food supply chains sustainability assessment of the mango sector in Burkina Faso" which details the challenges of the mango sub-sectors in Burkina Faso, the contribution of the Value Chain to economic growth...

This data was collected during the project Odyssea - Observatory of the Dinamics of Societies and Environments in the Amazon. Through a partnership with Family Farmer Unions (STTR), community researchers realized surveys with kobotoolbox application in 32 rural communities in the...

entry.title: A Reference Weed Flora of the 30 tropical weed studies datasets (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)

A Reference Weed Flora of the 30 tropical weed studies datasets

Reference list of weed species used in the 30 datasets of the Tropical Weed Studies Dataverse. This list currently contains 1788 taxa. All species are listed with their EPPO code (used in the floristic data files of the datasets), Scientific name, Family name, and the most used s...

entry.title: Database of wood properties from specimens of the French Guiana wood collection (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)
entry.content:
Database of wood properties from specimens of the French Guiana wood collection
Oct 7, 2021 - Xylothèque
Beauchêne, Jacques; Thibaut, Bernard; Amusant, Nadine; Cigna,Jeremy, 2021, "Database of wood properties from specimens of the French Guiana wood collection", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/R4G7BC, CIRAD Dataverse, V2, UNF:6:8JCn3T9n1TCMtIvIvAx2Lg== [fileUNF]
The wood collection (Xylotheque or Xylarium) of Kourou (French Guiana) was created in 1976 by Jean Thiel and has since been augmented by many contributors. It is a child collection of the Xylotheque of Montpellier. A Xylarium, like the one in Kourou, is a unique collection of woo...

entry.title: Dataset of repellency of wild oregano to whiteflies (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)

These data support the research article "Repellency of wild oregano plant volatiles, Plectranthus amboinicus, and their essential oils to the silverleaf whitefly , Bemisia tabaci, on tomato ”. We tested three origins of wild oregano, including northern (WO1), central (WO2) and so...

This dataset describes 12 Cavendish cultivars for their phenology, their morphology, their biomass and their bunch characteristics and their root system architecture. Except for the root traits, all measurements were performed on two crop cycles and 10 repetitions per cultivar an...

entry.title: Tree species inventory in the Faidherbia albida parkland of Senegal (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)

The tree inventory was conducted in the Faidherbia albida parkland in Senegal, in the region of Niakhar. A field campaign for tree species data collection was carried out in May 2018. It is a weighted stratified sampling of 213 observation sites distributed according to a landsca...

entry.title: Databases of the publication entitled : "Estimation of red deer population and its impact on Tugay forest ecosystem in the Lower Amu Darya State Biosphere Reserve, Uzbekistan" (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)
entry.content:
Databases of the publication entitled : "Estimation of red deer population and its impact on Tugay forest ecosystem in the Lower Amu Darya State Biosphere Reserve, Uzbekistan"
Sep 27, 2021 - Forêts et Sociétés
Cornelis Daniel; Gond Valery; Cesaro Jean-Daniel; Peltier Régis, 2021, "Databases of the publication entitled : "Estimation of red deer population and its impact on Tugay forest ecosystem in the Lower Amu Darya State Biosphere Reserve, Uzbekistan"", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/THSVXS, CIRAD Dataverse, V2
In 2011, the Government of Uzbekistan established the Lower Amu Darya State Biosphere Reserve (LABR). This reserve aims to conserve the Tugay, an endangered riparian forest ecosystem straddling the main rivers of Central Asia’s drylands, which is under extreme anthropogenic press...

Additive genetic variance for traits least related to fitness increases with environmental stress in the desert locust, Schistocerca gregaria. Ecology and Evolution, 00:1-18.", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/S735JB, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
Phenotypic and pedigree data and R scripts for analyses (v. 4.0.4).

entry.title: Guillaume Néry: A Traverse Across the Pyrenees (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Guillaume Néry: A Traverse Across the Pyrenees Each summer, I set off on an adventurous trip with good friends who are up for a challenge. Last year, we bikepacked through the Alps and this year we tackled the Pyrenees.

entry.title: Roc d'Azur: The CDC Gravel Team. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

Roc d'Azur: The CDC Gravel Team. At Café du Cycliste we really like gravel and so we have formed the ‘True Grit’ Café du Cycliste team. Three fierce female riders, Holly, Charlotte and Maria, take on one of the greatest gravel events in the world.

entry.title: I am not number 06. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
FILMS

I am not number 06. Alexia is the 10th woman in the world among nearly 100 skippers to have finished the Vendée Globe race without stopping and without assistance. Cycling is her other passion.

entry.title: The Best Tortilla in the World (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA VIE

The Best Tortilla in the World is found at the end of a hard day spent riding with friends on ancient Galician roads.

entry.title: Café du Cycliste x 66°North Lookbook (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
COLLECTIONS

Café du Cycliste x 66°North Lookbook Café du Cycliste has joined forces with one of Iceland’s oldest manufacturing companies, 66°North to present a special collection of technical gear.

entry.title: Café du Cycliste x 66°North (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
COLLECTIONS

Café du Cycliste x 66°North A collaboration of brands to create cycling apparel designed for Iceland, allowing cyclists to tackle the winter weather anywhere in the world.

entry.title: Caravan (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Caravan A collective of like minded sports people bonded by a shared love of cycling. Their reasons for riding are varied but they all have a common passion for exploring on two wheels.

entry.title: Rindu Alam Puncak: a Ride in Indonesia. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

Rindu Alam Puncak: a Ride in Indonesia. Grace Adoe rides up to Puncak, one of two iconic cycling routes in Jakarta, climbing over 1,000m through traditional markets and tea plantations for some poffertjes at Rindu Alam.

entry.title: Ride of the Month: September. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Ride of the Month: September. A 1300m climb to explore the wild animal reserve of the Monts d’Azur and ride the thrilling descent down the other side, through tunnels cut in the rock.

entry.title: A Tour of the Volcanoes of Auvergne. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

A Tour of the Volcanoes of Auvergne. Sophie Gateau explores the Auvergne region, where there are probably more cows than humans per m2, armed with our camera, a tent and a knife.

entry.title: Caravan: Guillaume Néry (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Caravan: Guillaume Néry Cycling has forged me into the athlete I am today, but it is so much more than just a way to train as it encompasses travel, exploration and discovery, some of my great passions in life.

entry.title: Coins Cachés Cambridge. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

Coins Cachés Cambridge. A city of history, culture and world-changing discoveries. Explore roads less ridden along the flat, exposed Fenlands, over Belgian berg-like climbs and through the iconic backstreets of Cambridge.
